There is Workspace Switcher applet for the gnome panel
yeah but i was wondering if there was an independent applet that sits in the desktop
Not that I know of unless you use a dockapp in a window manager that has a dock
You first need to be using a Window Manager that has a dock
Metacity is the default window manager in gnome, but you can replace it with another wm
https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Replace_Metacity_with_Openbox_in_gnome  if you want to use the openbox window manager
You can use a lot of the info in that guide for other wm's
